82 /*========== Test Cases =====================================================*/
83 
84 void testModuleInterfacesWithInvalidValues(void) {
85  TEST_ASSERT_FAIL_ASSERT(PEX_SetPin(5, PEX_PIN00));
86  TEST_ASSERT_FAIL_ASSERT(PEX_SetPin(PEX_PORT_EXPANDER1, 16u));
87 
88  TEST_ASSERT_FAIL_ASSERT(PEX_ResetPin(5, PEX_PIN00));
89  TEST_ASSERT_FAIL_ASSERT(PEX_ResetPin(PEX_PORT_EXPANDER1, 16u));
90 
91  TEST_ASSERT_FAIL_ASSERT(PEX_GetPin(5, PEX_PIN00));
92  TEST_ASSERT_FAIL_ASSERT(PEX_GetPin(PEX_PORT_EXPANDER1, 16u));
93 
94  TEST_ASSERT_FAIL_ASSERT(PEX_SetPinDirectionInput(5, PEX_PIN00));
95  TEST_ASSERT_FAIL_ASSERT(PEX_SetPinDirectionInput(PEX_PORT_EXPANDER1, 16u));
96 
97  TEST_ASSERT_FAIL_ASSERT(PEX_SetPinDirectionOutput(5, PEX_PIN00));
98  TEST_ASSERT_FAIL_ASSERT(PEX_SetPinDirectionOutput(PEX_PORT_EXPANDER1, 16u));
99 
100  TEST_ASSERT_FAIL_ASSERT(PEX_SetPinPolarityInverted(5, PEX_PIN00));
101  TEST_ASSERT_FAIL_ASSERT(PEX_SetPinPolarityInverted(PEX_PORT_EXPANDER1, 16u));
102 
103  TEST_ASSERT_FAIL_ASSERT(PEX_SetPinPolarityRetained(5, PEX_PIN00));
104  TEST_ASSERT_FAIL_ASSERT(PEX_SetPinPolarityRetained(PEX_PORT_EXPANDER1, 16u));
105 }
